activities.name: Get Metadata for file or folder

source.sqlReaderQuery: select EmployeeName,Age,Education,Gender from dbo.Emp where Gender='Male'

Select max([Last_m]) as Last_m
from tbluser

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@select * from [dbo].[tbluser]
where Last_m <=
'@(activity('Get Max Modified Date').output'.firstRow.Last_m)'
AND Last_m >
'@(activity('Last Modified Date').output.firstRow.lastloadDate)'

activities.name: Copy Emp Files to Emp Tables

dependsOn.activity: Copy Emp Files to Emp Tables
